name: Population growth in the city
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-5.png)

There are 180000 people living in the city. The population is increasing by 3% per year due to natural increase.
What will be the population of the city one year from now?

Create a `people` variable and assign it the value 180000.
Then write a command that increases the value of the `people` variable by 3%.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what you need to do,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
let a = 100;
a = a + a * 0.05; // the command increases the value of the variable `a` by 5 percent.
```
